29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

554722.name: Daythunder Anamnesis
554722.lore:
When the child of humanity drank of the crystal core, they lost the gift to sense human hearts. From then onward, their only purpose was to watch over the earth, bound to endless cycles of stars and moons.
They continued to cherish life, yet could no longer perceive neighbors as living beings.

"Prostrate upon the earth, longing for the touch of blue skies. Yet, once soaring high, the humble fragrance of grass is beyond all price..."
comeFrom: Echo of War: "Fortress of Dome" Eye of Twilight

589817.name: Crystal Meteorites
589817.desc: The crystals that separate from the Amber Lord's body when THEY swing the celestial hammer. Used to level up Traces moderately for Preservation characters.
589817.lore:
People only become aware of the fact that Qlipoth has swung THEIR hammer again from the two phenomena invariably detected afterward: An enormous burst of intense gravitational waves, and "starquakes." Like a gift from the Preservation, the crystal meteorites dash across the dark sky and announce the beginning of a new Era.

"The Genius Society is audacious enough to declare the Amber Lord as the slowest Aeon in the Cosmos, but none of these people have ever successfully observed the entire process of Qlipoth swinging the celestial hammer."

673758.name: Divine Amber
673758.desc: The amber that rains from the Amber Lord's body when THEY swing the celestial hammer. Used to level up Traces significantly for Preservation characters.
673758.lore:
Although Pier Point sent out Meteor Hunters and intercepted most of the meteors, the brightest one among all these shooting stars will always only be seen by the chosen one.

"It is a part of the divine body of the Aeon, albeit an insignificant one. Only the chosen ones, with their minds as steadfast as cornerstones and having endured challenges and hardships, can chisel apart this amber and unleash the crystalized light within."

874344.name: Scattered Stardust
874344.desc: The dust that falls from the Amber Lord's body when THEY swing the divine hammer. Used to level up Traces slightly for Preservation characters.
874344.lore:
The guards at Pier Point have never left their posts on Qlipoth's orbit, simply waiting for a miracle that only occurs once in decades or even centuries — How stardust splutters up like countless raindrops the moment the giant hammer falls.

"The stardust are simply insignificant dust to the Amber Lord, but to us, every speck of it contains the essence of Preservation."

20170864.name: Courage-Torn Chest
20170864.desc: A fragment of the Strife Titankins after their demise. Normal material used for enhancement.
20170864.lore:
The slothful generals began to drill, and the reclusive sages began to plot. Then humanity discovered they could shatter the creations of gods, and slaughter became war.

"Fear is the chisel of courage."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Crepuscular Beasts at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

20389475.name: Glory-Aspersed Torso
20389475.desc: The heart of a Strife Titankin, full of divine power. Advanced material used for enhancement.
20389475.lore:
In the beginning, humanity fought wars to stay alive, but now some fight as fearlessly as the Titankins of Strife to achieve death. The Kremnoans say that perhaps warriors of flesh and stone share the same heart —

"And this heart is called glory, with courage flowing within."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Crepuscular Beasts at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

20445700.name: Fear-Stomped Flesh
20445700.desc: Dust that forms the Strife Titankins. Crude material used for enhancement.
20445700.lore:
The tide of death sweeps across the world, and giants of hatred and resentment step forth from the River of Souls. All fear and cower before that stone-carved legion.

"Slaughter is the stone from which fear is hewn."

29937571.name: Invasive Clot
29937571.desc: Black Tide Creatures' core crystal. Can be used for the Ascension of Physical characters.
29937571.lore:
Truly, the followers of black tide appear in countless forms and can reliably be identified by their crystals. Yet, no one realizes that what seems to be the core is, in truth, merely the "outer shell."

"I saw a sea of crystals, and then — the relieved smile of the physician."

ranks.name: Shed Scales of Old
ranks.descHash: When Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae uses Ultimate, recovers <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> Skill Point(s) and increases the "Bondmate's" All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>, lasting for <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> turn(s).

ranks.name: Watch Trails to Blaze
ranks.descHash: Additionally increases the number of actions for the enhanced Souldragon from Ultimate by <nobr>#1[i]</nobr>. After Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae uses Ultimate, Souldragon <u>advances action</u> by <nobr>100%</nobr>. When the enhanced "Souldragon" takes action, the <u>Additional DMG</u> dealt by the "Bondmate" becomes <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of its original DMG, and the Shield Effect provided in this instance becomes <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr> of its original Shield Effect.

ranks.name: Bear Weight of Worlds
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: By Oath, This Vessel Is I
ranks.descHash: Reduces the DMG taken by the "Bondmate" by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: The Path of Permanence Sweeps Far
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: One Dream to Enfold All Wilds
ranks.descHash: When the "Bondmate" is on the field, increases the DMG taken by all enemies by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the "Bondmate" deals DMG, ignores <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr> of the enemy targets' DEF. When Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae uses Ultimate, the "Bondmate" will deal <u>Additional DMG</u> of the Bondmate's Type to all enemies, equal to <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of the Bondmate's ATK.

skills.descHash: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK to one designated enemy.
skills.name: Aegis Vitae

skills.descHash:
Designates one ally character as the "Bondmate" and provides all allies with a Shield that can offset DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK plus #2[i] for #3[i] turn(s). When repeatedly receiving Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Shield, can stack the Shield Effect, but it will not exceed #4[i]% of the current Shield provided by Skill.
"Bondmate" only applies to the most recent target of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Skill.
skills.name: Terra Omnibus

skills.descHash:
Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK to all enemies, and provides a Shield to all allies that can offset DMG equal to #4[f1]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK plus #5[i], lasting for #6[i] turn(s). When repeatedly receiving Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Shield, can stack the Shield Effect, but it will not exceed #7[i]% of the current Shield provided by Skill.
"Souldragon" becomes enhanced. When "Souldragon" takes action, launches Follow-up ATK, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies equal to #2[i]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK and Additional DMG of the Bondmate's Type to all enemies equal to #8[f1]% of the Bondmate's ATK. The enhancement lasts for #3[i] "Souldragon" action(s).
skills.name: A Dragon's Zenith Knows No Rue

skills.descHash:
When an ally character becomes the "Bondmate," Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae summons "Souldragon" for them, which has an initial SPD of #5[i].
When "Souldragon" takes action, dispels #6[i] debuff(s) from all allies and provides a Shield that can offset DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK plus #2[i] for #3[i] turn(s). The Shield Effect provided by Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae and "Souldragon" can be stacked, but it will not exceed #4[i]% of the Shield provided by Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Skill.
When Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae or the "Bondmate" is knocked down, "Souldragon" disappears.
skills.name: Of Virtue, Forms Unfold

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and after the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash:
After using Technique, gains "Bondmate" and inflict Daze on enemies within a certain area for #1[i] second(s). Dazed enemies will not actively attack ally targets.
When switching the active character, "Bondmate" transfers to the current active character. At the start of the next battle, automatically uses Skill 1 time on the character with "Bondmate" without consuming any Skill Points.
skills.name: Earthrend

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When "Souldragon" takes action, additionally provides a Shield that can offset DMG equal to <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK plus <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> to the ally target whose current Shield Effect is the lowest. When repeatedly receiving Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Shield, can stack the Shield Effect, but it will not exceed <nobr>#4[i]%</nobr> of the current Shield provided by Skill. When the enhanced "Souldragon" takes action, additionally deals 1 instance of <u>Additional DMG</u> of the Bondmate's Type to the one enemy target whose current HP is the highest, equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of the Bondmate's ATK.
embedBonusSkill.name: Sublimity

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When using Skill, increases ATK for the target who has become "Bondmate" by an amount equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's ATK.
embedBonusSkill.name: Empyreanity

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When combat starts, Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae <u>advances action</u> by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When the "Bondmate" uses an attack, Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae regenerates <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> Energy and "Souldragon" <u>advances action</u> by <nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Sylvanity

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: As you can see, that transformation was brought about by the power of the Permanence. Though you may have many questions, I'd like to reintroduce myself before I answer them. I am the Guard of the Astral Express, your companion, Dan Heng the Nameless.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: You wish to greet me with Amphorean etiquette? Go ahead. Though I think our usual way is just fine.

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: I'll keep watch tonight. Get some rest. We'll need our strength for what's coming tomorrow.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Permansor Terrae
voiceItems.text: After I accepted the Coreflame of Earth as one of Long's Scions, the power of the Permanence within this body became a shield for all life in Amphoreus, carrying them into the distant sea of stars to race freely through the boundless unknown beyond.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Reason for Trailblazing
voiceItems.text: At first, I had nowhere to call home but the Express. The Trailblaze? It felt more like a ticket to escape from my past than a journey forward. But before I knew it... Every stop the Express made became a new beginning for me.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Cloud-Piercer
voiceItems.text: Cloud-Piercer was once broken, but it became more indestructible than ever after its rebirth.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Records
voiceItems.text: Whatever happens in the future, I hope the records we collected and compiled in Amphoreus will help the cosmos gain an objective and complete understanding of it.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies: Listening
voiceItems.text: All living beings have their own ways of communication. For instance, the dromas language has thirty-two different regional variants... Was that a bit too much? Sorry.

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: Amphoreus is fraught with dangers... We must consider every possible method to ensure everyone's safe return.

voiceItems.title: Share
voiceItems.text: The black tide's corrosion, the ravages of divine wars, and the deluge of memoria... Amphoreus's Earth has endured so much pain, yet it has never failed in its duty to protect all living beings. It embodies the true way of the Permanence: not in achieving immortality alone, but in preserving all things.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: The Vidyadhara of the Luofu wield the art of water and rain-calling, while the ancient dragons of Amphoreus once held the power to raise the heavens and anchor the earth. The great Long is no more, yet we have barely glimpsed THEIR mysteries... Who can say what the journey ahead may reveal?

voiceItems.title: About Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: Fearless, optimistic, confident... I learn so much every time I trailblaze with you.

voiceItems.title: About March 7th: Evernight
voiceItems.text: Be it Evernight, or the two of us, Trailblazer, we'll become memories of March 7th's past... yet walk beside her as she moves forward.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Gods, Sound the Anthem of Creation"

voiceItems.title: About Aglaea
voiceItems.text: The future spun from golden thread was nothing more than a dream, but her sincere and unwavering heart led others to bring it to life.

voiceItems.title: About Tribbie
voiceItems.text: "Those who are truly great never lose their childlike innocence." I'm reminded of this old Xianzhou saying whenever I see them.

voiceItems.title: About Mydei
voiceItems.text: As king, he personally shaped the transformation of the Kremnoan Dynasty. His power to reform left a deeper mark than Strife ever could.

voiceItems.title: About Castorice
voiceItems.text: Her thousand-year journey proved once again that living with a clear conscience means more than a long lifespan.

voiceItems.title: About Anaxa
voiceItems.text: His style is completely different from that of ordinary teachers... If we had the chance to spend more time together, I'm sure we'd have plenty to talk about.

voiceItems.title: About Hyacine
voiceItems.text: That sky where twilight converges has already brought glimmers of hope to life in Amphoreus.

voiceItems.title: About Cipher
voiceItems.text: Everyone might be running away from something, but in the end, we all eventually head towards what we truly desire.

voiceItems.title: About Phainon
voiceItems.text: When I grasped the Coreflame, the conflagration of thirty million recurrences felt real for the first time. His endurance and defiance deserve the highest respect from the Nameless.

voiceItems.title: About Terravox
voiceItems.text: Heavier than the Coreflame of Earth are the hopeful gazes of every living being in Amphoreus. His journey reached its end. Now it's time for us to carry that hope forward.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Gods, Sound the Anthem of Creation"

voiceItems.title: About Hysilens
voiceItems.text: As a fellow kin of water, I am always reminded of Scalegorge Waterscape's tides when she sings... I hope the people of Amphoreus may one day find a sea just as clear and pure.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Gods, Sound the Anthem of Creation"

voiceItems.title: About Cyrene
voiceItems.text: It is thanks to her that the ages were carved into an epic, preserved, not scattered to the wind. In the future, these memories will surely grant the Chrysos Heirs the courage to keep moving forward.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Trailblaze Mission "Gods, Sound the Anthem of Creation"

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: If my spear shows even a sliver of hesitation, then it won't pierce destiny's indomitable wall.

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: These newborn scales grow ever harder.

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: I'll use this power to my heart's content.

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: Every twist and turn, every hardship... they're all part of the road "I" chose.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: Focus on what's ahead. I'll hold off their attacks.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With March 7th
voiceItems.text: March, time to show us what you're really made of.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Himeko
voiceItems.text: I won't let a single comrade fall behind, Miss Himeko.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Welt
voiceItems.text: Be at ease, Mr. Yang. We're no longer the fledgling Nameless we once were.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Sunday
voiceItems.text: We've truly begun to understand each other in battle.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Evernight
voiceItems.text: I'll say this upfront: Please do NOT go against March's wishes.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Phainon
voiceItems.text: To safeguard hope... that too is every Nameless one's duty.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: To fulfill the duty of a Guard, one must continue to temper oneself.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae
voiceItems.text: Mmm. Time to set off again.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Hysilens
voiceItems.text: I can also assist with commanding the waters.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: We have the edge.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: I'll stand in their way.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: My strength is not what it was... it's more.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: My purpose has always been to protect.

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: Do not let this moment slip away.

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK
voiceItems.text: Incoming!

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: Mountains roar. Dragons rise!

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: Earth shatters. Heaven trembles!

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: I'll endure.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: I need... to be better.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: Dragons, obey this order.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: Calamity undone. Soaring above the lands. This is permanence!

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: My duty... isn't over.

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: Another rebirth.

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: Do not worry. This is nothing.

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: A will of metal and stone.

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: Bearing their hopes, I guard this land.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: I'll take this back to the Express. Time to restock.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: Hey, hold on to that. Never know when it might help.

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: A good haul. That's the essence of Trailblazing.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: As effortless as instinct.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: Let instinct guide what reason delays.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: No need to hesitate. Your judgment brought you this far.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: When the heart changes, so does the world it sees.

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
The chest of Georios, the body of the fallen dragon supporting the shattered earth, enduring millennia of pain.
Dan Heng, the Nameless and the Chrysos Heir who guards the Earth's Coreflame, steadies the world before it falls and guides all life across the land to a new home beyond.
Rivers flow to the sea, mountains echo in harmony, and the eternal path stretches ten thousand miles.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
He never imagined this day would come, when the Trailblaze seemed to screech to an abrupt halt.
The acrid smell of blood spread as the wrecked car spewed choking smoke and dust. He struggled to his feet, groping for direction in the darkness.
Tick-tock, tick-tock... In the deathly silence, only the echoes of life slipping away remained.

"Trailblazer..."
The deformed components in the car blocked his path. Fighting through excruciating pain, he removed the obstacles one by one. Warm blood trickled down his fingertips, but what terrified him more was that he could barely sense that familiar breathing anymore.

"Let's... go home together."
He administered the medicine he carried, the nearly depleted spirit water swirling in his palm, but against such horrific wounds, even healing was futile.
The Black Tide Creatures prowled, surrounding them both with their howls. The Cloud-Piercer shattered, crashing onto desolate rocks.
The spirit water turned crimson as he used his last ounce of strength to shield Trailblazer

He woke up from the nightmare, gasping for breath.
...

"What's up? Is there something on my face?"
At breakfast the next day, his gray-haired companion asked curiously.
"Thankfully it's not like in the dream..."
But he didn't say it out loud, just turned his gaze to the sky outside the window, "It's nothing... eat up."

The sky over Okhema remained azure blue.
But he couldn't help his thoughts from wandering, "I wonder if March is doing alright..."
The car plummeted like a burning meteor. Would she, arriving later, meet the same fate? Or perhaps something even worse...
He shook his head, pushing away the chaotic thoughts.

Another new day dawns.
With recording tools in hand, he prepares to head to the market.
The Trailblaze journey seems to be going as usual.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
His Trailblaze often begins with exploration and understanding.

"Little Dannie, hold on tight, sit tight, here we go..."
He sought knowledge of lost history from the red-haired girl, and they invited him to a history lesson overlooking the world.

"Kremnos's tradition?"
"Yes. May we have a duel?"
He asked the golden-haired crown prince. By the side, a white-haired youth was eager to try.
"I want to join as well. Traditions like this are better experienced."
The proud lion of Kremnos kept silent, responding only with a stance.

...

He ventured to the Grove, poring over every book in its collection, as the shattered world gradually took shape in his mind.
To find a way back to the stars, he delved deep into the ruins, investigating the mysteries of the world beyond the sky.

He records everything he experiences, just as he has done at every stop along the way.
But when the fate of the world rests upon a hero's shoulders, he knows that this "Trailblaze" cannot be reduced to mere cold entries.

Those were pivotal battles, each and every one.
Together with companions, they ended the history of "Strife" and witnessed the crown prince of Kremnos break from tradition.
Trailblazer joined the fray, returning the Coreflame of Time. When she/he returned from the treacherous nether realm, he still couldn't forget the joy of that day, like one who had survived a catastrophe.

Those were also countless moments of farewell.
The Holy Maiden's thousand forms withered, the sage was reduced to ashes, and the daughter of the River of Souls bid her final farewell to the mortal realm... He remembered at the time of parting, they were either sorrowful or content, but never once did they show any regret.

"If one day, we too shall come to this..."
Thinking of Trailblazer's destiny and March 7th who had yet to arrive, he too had spent sleepless nights over this.

"For a thousand years, we have all been prepared to face sacrifice, or to sacrifice ourselves for our companions..."
He had seen it more than once... The weaver gathering relics, embroidering them with a golden flower.
"Now... there are no regrets left."

Compared to the existence of the Permanence, their lives were like fleeting fyreflies.
Yet he could clearly see those twinkling lights illuminating the night sky they had traversed and would traverse together.

As Okhema falls into the blood-red twilight, the prophesied moment shall arrive.
Yet facing the inevitable strike from the black-clad swordmaster, his heart remains as calm as the vast ocean.

He believes Trailblazer will forge ahead without hesitation. By the faint glow of the Flame-Chase, he too caught a glimpse of the path he must take.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
At the end of Era Nova, the cold testing ground reveals its cruel core.
The tidal waves of the Remembrance merge into a tsunami, engulfing the pathstrider of Trailblaze. When he awakens, his companions are already lost in the bottomless Memory Zone.

He felt as if he'd returned to those solitary days before boarding the Express, yet the pain of this moment told him this was more than just a nightmare.
The moment he stepped back into the memoria tide, fragments of the past came rushing towards him...

"...Their heartbeat and pulse are very weak. March, get ready to perform CPR."
"Huh!? I... I don't have much experience with that. Dan Heng, you do it!"
He remembered their fateful first encounter with Trailblazer.

"I'm just imagining all the fun stuff that'll happen to us three... hehe!"
On the streets of Belobog, snow once blanketed their shoulders, and sharing a steaming hot wrap was enough to warm up the entire winter night.

"...As a descendant of the Vidyadhara, I will fulfill my duty to the Luofu."
In the presence of Trailblazer and March 7th, he broke free from the shadows of his past, as their laughter and chatter gradually melted away his snow-heavy memories.

"What did you encounter in Ena's Dream?"
"I dreamed of the Express passing station after station, with people coming and going, yet we five remained together throughout. This journey seemed as if it would never end."
In a similar Memory Zone, they had once escaped Penacony's dream together, leaving the most desired future to reality.

"Dan Heng, how much more can you sacrifice?"
The voice in his heart questioned his resolve, and he answered with decisive action.

The fading demigod entrusted the Coreflame to him. The moment he grasped it, countless gazes of desperate souls seemed to ignite his very being.
At the moment the Sacred Tree fell, he shouldered the burden of a world's creatures, fusing their bloodline with the earth of Amphoreus.

He ventured into the depths of earth's root system, searching for the direction of his companions.
Through vast jungles and endless seas, he traversed wind and frost, crossed the Dead Sea desert, and sometimes lost his way in this complex world.

In every moment when he stepped into darkness, he could always feel that gentle gaze behind him.
"We're retracing our old flight paths, with so much to redo. We need a guard... and an archiver."

"I am 'Dan Heng'..."
Along the inescapable path of the past, the wild dragon roars as it breaks free from all restraints, soaring towards the unfinished road ahead...

"I am... the one who guards the path of Trailblaze!"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
He felt as if he was back on the speeding Astral Express.
He watched as the Express ventured into the vast unknown, blazing trails never traveled before.

In the endlessly stretching path through space, he saw a giant dragon soaring through chaos.
It once slumbered in its egg, until one day it emerged in rebirth.
It met others of its kind, sharing the same bloodline and path.
It stirred vast spirit waters, bringing rain and nourishing all living things.
It upheld the earth of gold and stone, protecting the eternal prosperity of all nations...
Its path still winds toward the future.
War's flames licked its scales, and from that heat, it shed its old scales time and time again, gaining rebirth.
Then, together with the express, it leaped toward the future.

...

"You know, in the future, if the Express gets covered in a layer of cosmic barnacles that won't wash off, Dan Heng can use his... Dragonquake Boom to sand them away!"
"Great idea. Look, Dan Heng's waking up... Want to bet whether it was a good dream or..."

"You guys are too noisy..."
As soon as he opened his eyes, he saw Trailblazer and March whispering loudly next to his ear.
"Come on, spill it! Falling asleep at a time like this. What sweet dreams were you having?"

March stretched lazily, gazing into the distance with anticipation.
"Let me guess, did you dream about what's going to happen on our upcoming journey?"
"..."
"Do you even need to ask? Of course we're gonna beat up all the bad guys!"

The wind that blew then seemed to carry the aroma of breakfast from the Express.
"Let's... go home together."
He made a silent vow, as he had in the past, and would in the future.

name: Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae
descHash: The chest of Georios, the body of the fallen dragon supporting the shattered earth, enduring millennia of pain. Dan Heng, the Nameless and the Chrysos Heir who guards the Earth's Coreflame, steadies the world before it falls and guides all life across the land to a new home beyond. Rivers flow to the sea, mountains echo in harmony, and the eternal path stretches ten thousand miles.
